sentences: "No, kurat, kuidamoodi te seda siis tegite?" ei suutnud Tääker ikka veel uskuda.
Aga kuidamoodi sa filmid, kui ei oska!
"Kuidamoodi te seda siis tegite?" oli tema küsimus.
context: The word 'tegite' is the past tense (2nd person plural) form of the verb 'tegema' meaning 'to do' or 'to make'. In this context, it's part of the phrase 'kuidamoodi tegite' which translates to 'how did you do/make it?' The word appears in a question asking about the method or way something was accomplished.
